author: stefan2
msg: We only need to apply the path comparison hack for 'svn blame' in -g mode;
standard blame does the Right Thing even when mixing renames and changes.
Therefore, inform the hack when it needs to be applied and when not.
(send_baton): Add a flag for the -g mode.
(send_path_revision): Only apply the hack in -g mode.
svn_repos_get_file_revs2): Initialize the new baton field.
(handle_rev): Adapt - reverting the r1686478 change here.

author: desruisseaux
msg: WKT: delegate the decision to format Geocentric axis name to the transliterator.

author: ylavic
msg: Tests for Redirect* using non-redirect status, starting from 2.4.15.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Move AxisDirections internal class from 'sis-referencing' to 'sis-metadata' module
for reducing the amount of methods in ReferencingServices internal class.
